00049 /*===========================================================================
00050  *      File :          i_types.h
00051  *      Description :   IMPACT base types
00052  *      Creation Date : July 2000
00053  *      Author :        John W. Sias, Wen-mei Hwu
00054  *
00055  *==========================================================================*/
00056 #ifndef I_TYPES_H
00057 #define I_TYPES_H
00058 
00059 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00060 #include <config.h>
00061 
00062 #define ITMAXU32 0xFFFFFFFFlu
00063 #define ITMAXS32 0x7FFFFFFFl
00064 #define ITMINS32 0x80000000l
00065 
00066 /* Flag IT64BIT controls whether or not IMPACT is on a 64-bit host 
00067  * #define IT64BIT
00068  *
00069  * This should be set by the build system
00070  */
00071 
00072 typedef char ITint8;
00073 typedef unsigned char ITuint8;
00074 typedef short ITint16;
00075 typedef unsigned short ITuint16;
00076 typedef int ITint32;
00077 typedef unsigned int ITuint32;
00078 
00079 #ifdef IT64BIT
00080 
00081 /* 64-bit foundation types
00082  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083  */
00084 
00085 # ifdef _WIN32
00086 typedef _int64 ITint64;
00087 typedef unsigned _int64 ITuint64;
00088 #   define LLCONST(a) (a ## I64)
00089 #   define ULLCONST(a) (a ## uI64)
00090 #   define ITintmaxformat      "%I64d"
00091 #   define ITintmaxhexfmt      "%I64x"
00092 #   define ITintmaxoctfmt      "%I64o"
00093 #   define ITuintmaxformat     "%I64u"
00094 #   define ITintmaxsuffix      "I64"
00095 #   define ITuintmaxsuffix     "uI64"
00096 #   define ITintmaxcast        "(_int64)"
00097 #   define ITuintmaxcast       "(unsigned _int64)"
00098 # else
00099 typedef long long int ITint64;
00100 typedef long long unsigned int ITuint64;
00101 #   define LLCONST(a) (a ## ll)
00102 #   define ULLCONST(a) (a ## ull)
00103 #   define ITintmaxformat      "%lld"
00104 #   define ITintmaxhexfmt      "%llx"
00105 #   define ITintmaxoctfmt      "%llo"
00106 #   define ITuintmaxformat     "%llu"
00107 #   define ITintmaxsuffix      "LL"
00108 #   define ITuintmaxsuffix     "ULL"
00109 #   define ITintmaxcast        "(long long int)"
00110 #   define ITuintmaxcast       "(unsigned long long int)"
00111 # endif
00112 
00113 # define ITMAXU64 ULLCONST(0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF)
00114 # define ITMAXS64  LLCONST(0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF)
00115 # define ITMINS64  LLCONST(0x8000000000000000)
00116 
00117 # define ITINTMAX  ITMAXS64
00118 # define ITINTMIN  ITMINS64
00119 # define ITUINTMAX ITMAXU64
00120 # define ITMAXBITS 64
00121 
00122 typedef ITint64 ITintmax;
00123 typedef ITuint64 ITuintmax;
00124 
00125 #else
00126 
00127 /* 32-bit foundation types
00128  * ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00129  */
00130 
00131 typedef ITint32 ITintmax;
00132 typedef ITuint32 ITuintmax;
00133 # define ITintmaxformat      "%d"
00134 # define ITintmaxhexfmt      "%x"
00135 # define ITintmaxoctfmt      "%o"
00136 # define ITuintmaxformat     "%u"
00137 # define ITintmaxsuffix      "L"
00138 # define ITuintmaxsuffix     "UL"
00139 
00140 # define ITINTMAX  ITMAXS32
00141 # define ITINTMIN  ITMINS32
00142 # define ITUINTMAX ITMAXU32
00143 # define ITMAXBITS 32
00144 # define ITintmaxcast        "(int)"
00145 # define ITuintmaxcast       "(unsigned int)"
00146 #endif
00147 
00148 extern int IT_typecheck (void);
00149 extern int IT_punt (char *, ...);
00150 
00151 /* Safe casting macros */
00152 
00153 #ifdef IT64BIT
00154 
00155 #define ITicast(v) (((v)==(ITintmax)(ITint32)(v)) ? \
00156                     (ITint32)(v) : \
00157                     IT_punt(__FILE__ ": %d with value %llx", __LINE__, v))
00158 
00159 #define ITuicast(v) (((v)<=(ITuintmax)(ITMAXU32)) ? \
00160                     (ITint32)(v) : IT_punt(__FILE__ ": %d", __LINE__))
00161 #else
00162 
00163 #define ITicast(v) (v)
00164 
00165 #define ITuicast(v) (v)
00166 #endif
00167 
00168 #endif
00169 
00170 /* Macro for library calls */
00171 
00172 #ifdef IT64BIT
00173 
00174 #define ITabs(v)  (((v) < 0) ? \
00175                   (-(v)) : (v))
00176 
00177 #else
00178 
00179 #define ITabs(v)  abs(v)
00180 
00181 #endif
